name: NEFlowMetaData
desc: Additional information about data flowing through a per-app VPN provider.

items.name: var sourceAppUniqueIdentifier: Data
items.desc: A NSData object containing a unique hash value of the source application. This value changes between different versions of an application.

items.name: var sourceAppSigningIdentifier: String
items.desc: An NSString containing the signing identifier of the source application.

items.name: var sourceAppAuditToken: Data?
items.desc: The audit token of the source application of the flow.
